SELECT A.MemberID memberId, C.MemCode AS memberCode, B.Name AS memberName, B.MobilePhone AS mobile, Convert(char(10),convert(datetime,C.GrantDate),120) + ' ' + ISNULL(C.GrantTime,'00:00:00') AS grantCardTime, A.Points AS grantPoints, Convert(char(19),A.UseTime,120) AS grantPointTime, (CASE WHEN B.JoinDate >= Convert(Datetime,#startDate#) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) newOldMemberFlag, CNT.CounterCode AS counterCode,
CNT.NameForeign AS counterName, X.RegionNameForeign AS region, Y.RegionNameForeign AS province, Z.RegionNameForeign AS city
CNT.CounterNameIF AS counterName, X.RegionNameChinese AS region, Y.RegionNameChinese AS province, Z.RegionNameChinese AS city
CNT.CounterNameIF AS counterName, X.RegionNameChinese AS region, Y.RegionNameChinese AS province, Z.RegionNameChinese AS city
FROM Basis.BIN_PrtUniqueCodeDetail A JOIN Members.BIN_MemberInfo B ON A.MemberID IS NOT NULL AND A.MemberID = B.BIN_MemberInfoID JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo CNT ON CNT.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization O ON O.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region X ON O.BIN_RegionID = X.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region Y ON O.BIN_ProvinceID = Y.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region Z ON O.BIN_CityID = Z.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo C ON C.BIN_MemberInfoID = A.MemberID AND C.MemCode=A.MemberCode WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.ActivationStatus = '1' AND A.UseStatus = '1'
